According to legend, over a thousand years ago,...
...in the mountains of Ethiopia, there lived a goat herder named Kaldi.
One day, he noticed something kind of strange.
His goats had been browsing on the berries of a small tree...
...and this seemed to make them unusually peppy,...
...jumping around and unwilling to go to sleep at night.
After trying the berries himself, Kaldi reported them to others...
Thus, the cup of coffee was born.
